JobFullDesc: Company DescriptionYouGov is an international research and data analytics group.  Our mission is to supply a continuous stream of accurate data and insight into what the world thinks, so that companies, governments and institutions can better serve the people and communities that sustain them.   We have the best data and the best tools. We continuously challenge conventional approaches to research, and we disrupt our industry to ensure that our clients always get the best solutions. We are driven by a set of shared values. We are fast, fearless and innovative. We work diligently to get it right. We are guided by accuracy, ethics and proven methodologies. We trust each other and bring these values into everything that we do.   Each day, our highly engaged proprietary global panel of over 8 million people provides us with thousands of data points on consumer opinions, attitudes and behaviour. We combine this continuous stream of data with our research expertise to provide insights that enable intelligent decision-making and informed conversations.    With operations in the UK, North America, Mainland Europe, the Nordics, the Middle East and Asia Pacific, YouGov has one of the world’s largest research networks. The Finance Systems unit forms part of the Group Finance department, tasked with managing the Group’s ERP and BI systems, developing and promoting analytical capabilities and insights, and establishing an effective Master Data strategy.   Job DescriptionThe Role You’ll be joining our Mumbai based BI Development team where you’ll be primarily working on the visual design and UX of internal operational reports which are distributed across all YouGov business units and departments. Your main technical tool will be Power BI, and in collaboration with the entire development team you will be taking our existing report offerings to the next level. The role will report into the Finance Systems team Lead What will I be doing? Development and maintenance of Power BI reports and dashboards as part of an established suite of standard report packs, following an agile methodology Adherence to existing reporting standards and contributions to advancing those standards Research and prototype new and improved user experiences Own deployment of reports Performing regression testing Maintain release notes and user documentations QualificationsWhat do I need to bring with me?  2-3 years of experience with Power BI (or similar reporting tool), specifically in the visual aspects of reports and dashboards High level of attention to detail and accuracy alongside the ability to work in a fast-paced environment Very good command of English Ideally some knowledge and experience in the domains of Finance/Accounting, Sales/Marketing Working experience of using source control tools (preferably Gitlab) Working experience of DevOps and CI/CD principle (e.g. Octopus Deploy, Gitlab, Azure DevOps) Knowledge of BI testing framework (e.g. NBi) Knowledge of SQL Working knowledge of DAX Additional InformationWhat’s in it for me? Be part of a successful, growing, global company which strongly believes in the value and power of technology.Be one of the key players in the technological transformation of the Finance department. Behavioural competencies First and foremost, have a customer-first attitude Be a self-starter with a very high degree of initiative and proactivity Learn new technologies fast Actively follow industry trends Enjoy mentoring others and passing on knowledge and skills
